channel.title: Projects on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Interstellar Jellyfish: a Blender Journey
item.description: Started exploring geometry nodes and space settings in blender, inspired by one of my research projects in which I found carbonic interstellar molecules that looked like jellyfish. (I made a version with that molecule as well but I don’t dare to show it before my paper has been published).

item.title: Space Whales and Pipe Goats
item.description: Some projects from 2023; oil on canvas, aquarelle and pencils
